effect.short: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
effect.full: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.

flavorTexts.text:
With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a
party Pokémon.
